name: d3-sankey
description: Visualize flow between nodes in a directed acyclic network.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-arrays:d3_arrays,d3-interpolate:d3_interpolate -u d3-sankey -n d3_sankey -o build/d3-sankey.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-sankey.js -c -m -o build/d3-sankey.min.js && rm -f build/d3-sankey.zip && zip -j build/d3-sankey.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-sankey.js build/d3-sankey.min.js
